PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08312024-06-21PSPC, CPC
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of Auditor and Joint Auditor of the Canada Post Corporation
PrecisOrder appointing (1) ERNST & YOUNG LLP of Ottawa, Ontario as AUDITOR of CANADA POST CORPORATION for the year 2024; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of CANADA POST CORPORATION for the year 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order appointing (1) ERNST & YOUNG LLP of Ottawa, Ontario as AUDITOR of CANADA POST CORPORATION for the year 2024; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of CANADA POST CORPORATION for the year 2024.
